document_data.name: City Guard of Rog'osto
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Rog'osto]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Spires".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 1,000 infantry, 400 palace guards, and 200 [[jann]]. Additionally, each of the city's towers housed a personal guard of around 200 soldiers each.
document_data.Activities: The martial forces of Rog'osto were extremely weak compared to every other city in [[Zakhara]]. However, the presence of so many powerful [[wizard]]s made potential enemies think twice before attacking the city.
